law.catch_line: A motor carrier permit may not be issued unless the Commission, after considering the number of vehi...
law.text: A motor carrier permit may not be issued unless the Commission, after considering the number of vehicles the applicant will use, the rate the applicant will charge, the potential demand, the qualifications of the applicant, and any other factors that the Commission considers relevant, determines that the issuance of a motor carrier permit will be best for the public welfare and convenience.
